categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars Galaxies
Category:Commission for the Preservation of the New Order personnel

nodes.text: Bardent Lourge was a male Imperial agent of the Commission for the Preservation of the New Order who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Dialogue pertaining to Bardent Lourge appeared in the directory tree files for the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided. However, he never actually appeared on the video game's live servers as a proper non-player character.
